#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int in()
{
    char temp[20];
    scanf("%s",&temp);
    int ret=0;
    bool f=false;
    for(int i=0;i<strlen(temp);++i)
    {
        if(temp[i]=='.') {f=true;continue;}
        ret=(ret*10)+(temp[i]-'0');
    }
    if(!f) ret*=100;
    return ret;
}


int main()
{
    int t,n,m,i,j,res,sc,test,count[100];
    int a[100],amnt;
    double f;
    cout.precision(2);
    cout.setf(ios::fixed,ios::floatfield);
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(test=1;test<=t;++test)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        for(i=0;i<n;++i)
        {
            a[i]=in();
       //     cout<<"a[i]: "<<a[i]<<endl;
        }
        sort(a,a+n);
        printf("Case %d:\n",test);
        for(int sc=1;sc<=m;++sc)
        {
            printf("Scenario %d:\n",sc);
            amnt=in();
        //    cout<<"AMOUNT: "<<amnt<<endl;
            for(i=n-1;i>=0;--i)
            {
                count[i]=amnt/a[i];
                amnt%=a[i];
            }
            for(i=n-1;i>=0;--i)
            {
                if(count[i]==0) continue;
                if(a[i]<100)
                {
                    f=a[i]/100.0;
                    cout<<f<<" "<<count[i]<<endl;
                }
                else
                     printf("%d %d\n",(a[i]/100),count[i]);
            }
        }
    }
}
